Name: Soobmarinno
About the game: Soobmarinno is a pixelated underwater adventure game about exploring the ocean depths fighting deadly sea-creatures in search of ancient gold. Travel through this amazing lost world and find out its secrets. Key Features • Melancholic underwater atmosphere. • Relaxed and chill gameplay. • Beautiful hand-crafted pixel art. • Peaceful soundtrack
